Articles.Content:
The challenge is simple: Get the picture/video/etc of your first/oldest successfull rocket, and recreate it. Post pictures of before and after, aswell as a small slideshow to prove that you did the mission.

Rules:

1) No intentional adjustments to the build. If the ship uses stock parts, you can't use any mods for the challenge. If you see obvious flaws with the craft, leave them in.

2) No cheating. You are not allowed to use cheats of any sort for the whole duration of the mission. (Unless the rocket was built before the atmospheric heating was a thing)

Good Luck
